20101208075624.857|20101208075626.286|CCO|INTERESTED ME.

20101208080332.000|20101208080334.000|CCO|>> WELL, IN A SMALL WAY IT MEANS
20101208080334.000|20101208080336.000|CCO|I NEVER LOSE MY WAY IN A SMALL

20101208080352.000|20101208080353.667|CCO|STRANGELY.
20101208080353.667|20101208080355.333|CCO|MY FATHER STARTED OUT AS A

20101208080400.333|20101208080402.000|CCO|>> Rose: WENT FROM AN ENGINEER

20101208081233.667|20101208081235.333|CCO|THAN A MILLION PEOPLE EVERY YEAR
